resources.string: I am very centered to my own growth and to achieve that I need to work extremely hard. To achieve excellence and beat competition I need to work harder.
I believe working hard in pressure condition to achieve the target. Working under pressure I always develop new capability and add new dimention to my performance.

I have developed the ability to see how a person is working and I understand how a person shoud work. I think about the hint a person need to achieve the task he is unable to do, and to bring his task in orientation with the task of the team.
